requirements.item: Remove avatars and name labels from chat messages.
Increase message width while keeping a slight offset between user and assistant.
Assistant messages render without outer background/border and use a subtle bullet marker.
User messages keep a distinct pill-style background to separate roles.
Loading state matches the assistant styling (no outer wrap, bullet marker).

e2eTests.name: Reference-inspired message layout
steps: Open a session with existing messages
Verify messages render without avatar circles or name labels
Confirm user and assistant messages are wider with a slight offset
Confirm assistant messages are unwrapped and display a bullet marker
Confirm user messages retain a pill-style background
Trigger a response and confirm the loading indicator matches the assistant style

acceptanceCriteria.item: Chat feels calmer and more transcript-like while preserving readability.
User and assistant roles are distinguishable via visual treatment only.
